-ite.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a follower or supporter of a particular idea or person – often used to show disapproval
-ite.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: a group of Trotskyites  (=followers of Trotsky’s political ideas)
-ite.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: relating to a particular set of religious or political ideas, or to the ideas of a particular person
-ite.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: someone who lives in a particular place or belongs to a particular group
